abstract: It was a media cage fight, televised every weeknight at 8 p.m. But the match was halted when the blood started to spray executives in the high-priced seats.
snippet: It was a media cage fight, televised every weeknight at 8 p.m. But the match was halted when the blood started to spray executives in the high-priced seats.

headline.main: How MSNBC and Fox Tamped Down the Olbermann-O’Reilly Feud
